In England, in the seven days to 17 September, there were 28,167 new confirmed cases (49.8 new cases per 100,000). In the seven days to 10 September, there were 24,991 new cases and so the new cases have risen by 13% (3,176 extra cases). The number of confirmed COVID-19 cases in England so far as at 22 September is 19,922,057 (35,229 cases per 100,000 population).
